name: BIB Token
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: BIB token is the platform pass of BIB Exchange and BIB Meta based on Binance Smart Chain (BSC). BIB Token created a DEX+CEX development path with exclusive traits. BIB holders can earn profits from BIB group's decentralized protocol BIB Meta and centralized crypto trading platform BIB Exchange including but not limited to capital gains of asset appreciation, transaction fee dividends, NFT minting, and other virtual entertainment utilities.
